text:

1.3). My OS is Windows Me.
creator: khruathong.sombat@wanadoo.fr

text:
Without more context [complete lines from the error log, a description of when
  this error is encountered or what request or condition triggers the problem]
  It's impossible to identify which problem or config issue this might be.

  If you would like to provide more details feel free to reopen.  First look at
  the existing reports, however, especially with the keyword FAQ.
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
It run smoothly with version 1.3 (in use) So, I don't think so that this 
problem come from Windows Me (Socket problem).
